description: A 13-dram (~48 ml) amber-colored translucent plastic bottle.  Meant to hold prescription-grade medication: pills  Ribbed cap makes it easier to open.
//weight: weight reference bottle @ 16 dram is 0.027 lbs = 12.247 g
this bottle @ 13 dram is 0.027 lbs × 0.8125 ≈ 0.022 lbs ≈ 10 g

notes: negative trim to account for the size of the cap
appears to be not considered in the provided dimensions, since the vial diameter and neck opening diameter are the same

//price_postapoc: relatively-high price for a tiny plastic container due to the fact that amber vials can reduce the effects of sunlight on the medication inside, making them more-valuable for drug storage
